        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationFileIO
        Get data from yml file. It may not needed depends on the trigger type. For CustomTrigger for example, you can get data from the yml file with this method.

        Description copied from class: AbstractInventoryTriggerManager
        Create actual inventory.
        Specified by:
        createInventory in class AbstractInventoryTriggerManager
        Parameters:
        size - size of inventory. Must be multiple of 9.
